ISSUE.TITLE: Upload plugin. Better description
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: You should add to the description that the plugin directory will be DELETED as some store owners may have some customization to the plugins and they should be aware that their customization will be lost. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/48672/nopcommerce-40-bug-fixes-and-improvements.aspx?p=5#195182
